title: Conspiring
description: When Bradley refuses to take Veronica to his cousin's wedding, she finds herself in the company of the charming and attractive Ian. There is no denying that Veronica and Ian have an intense, mutual attraction which draws them together like magnets. But what neither of them realizes is that their attraction isn't the only thing pulling them together. It is a small world, and itâ€™s about to get a whole lot smaller when an innocent fling turns into an intricate plan to conspire.
author: J.B. McGee
